summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of View pages for Leads and Purchase Orders. All view functionality working correctly with proper navigation, data display, and UI components.
passed_tests: Leads list page displays View button (eye icon) for each lead
Lead Detail page loads correctly when clicking View button
Lead Detail page shows all products in properly formatted table
Lead Detail page displays Items count badge correctly (9 Items)
Lead Detail page shows Total Amount correctly (₹7,44,13,650)
Lead Detail page has proper table headers (S.No, Product, Category, Quantity, Price, Amount)
Purchase Orders list page displays View button (eye icon) for each order
PO Detail page loads correctly when clicking View button
PO Detail page shows all products in properly formatted table
PO Detail page displays Items count badge correctly (2 Items)
PO Detail page shows Total Amount correctly (₹1,750)
PO Detail page has proper table headers (S.No, Product, Category, Quantity, Price, Amount)
Navigation back to list pages works correctly using back button
Proforma Invoice page loads correctly (empty state confirmed)
All routes are properly configured (/leads/:id and /purchase-orders/:id)
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
UI styling and layout is consistent across all pages
